summary.p: Orientalists papers collected. Various papers of various format hinged or pasted on pages, bound in one volume.

The volume contains:
f1-f36: Devanāgāri syllabary printed with fonts. 9 quires pasted on the page; continuous foliation from one quire to the other; verso blank.
f37-f38: 2 poems in Devanāgāri. Roman transcription, translation/transcription (?) in unidentified language, and French abstract for the first one. Arabic transcription, translation/transcription (?) in unidentified langauge, and French abstract for the first one.
f39-f40: a Grantha syllabary. 2 folios folded.
f41: note on Tamil grammar.
f42: list of Tamil words (Tamil in Tamil script, Tamil in Roman transcription, French translation). From puraṇi to māttirai. Written recto-verso.
f43: list of Tamil words (French translation, Tamil in Roman transcription). Numbers, selected words, short sentences. Written recto-verso.
f44-f62: list of Tamil words (Tamil in Roman transcription, Tamil in Tamil script, French translation and explanation) in Alphabetical order. Upper case letter headings: A, B, D, I, etc. Some written recto-verso.
f63: Issue of Qasid E Madras, 10th March 1855.
f64: visiting card of Charles d'Ochoa, with notes in Indic script
f65: letter of Garcin de Tassy addressed to Charles d'Ochoa in Bombay, 4th May 1844. 1 quire of 4 pages.
f66: letter certifying the bad health of Charles d'Ochoa. Signed by the staff surgeon, Poonah, 4th August 1844. 1 quire of 4 pages.
f67: Quelques renseignements sur le peuple des Batta’s en Sumatra, a note by Oscar de Kessel. 1 quire of 4 pages.
f68: Tamil syllabary. 1 folio folded.
f69: Traduction en langue Tamoul de l’arrêté qui abolit le commerce des esclaves à Pondichéry. 1 quire of 4 pages. Pages 3-4 blank.
f70: bilingual text (French and Tamil) on heritage rules.
f71: Tamil text in Tamil script, Tamil transcription, and translation.
f72-f76: list of Tamil words (Tamil in Tamil script, French translation). Written recto-verso.
f77: Discours de M. Lescallier à l’assemblée coloniale, traduit en langue tamoul, 17th December 1792. 3 folios with Tamil pagination 1-5.
f78: illustration, seemingly from a cave at Ellora.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (April 2019).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

collation.desc: 78 folios = Orientalists Papers. Arabic library foliation 1-78.

binding.p: Hard paper covers, marbled on the outer faces.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
